trans-unit.source: In Xamarin.Studio, open **Info.plist**, and update the **Bundle Identifier** with the ID that you created earlier.
trans-unit.target: In Xamarin.Studio, open **Info.plist**, and update the **Bundle Identifier** with the ID that you created earlier.

trans-unit.source: Scroll down to **Background Modes** and check the **Enable Background Modes** box and the **Remote notifications** box.
trans-unit.target: Scroll down to **Background Modes** and check the **Enable Background Modes** box and the **Remote notifications** box.

trans-unit.source: Double click your project in the Solution Panel to open **Project Options**.
trans-unit.target: Double click your project in the Solution Panel to open **Project Options**.

trans-unit.source: Choose **iOS Bundle Signing** under **Build**, and select the corresponding **Identity** and **Provisioning profile** you had just set up for this project.
trans-unit.target: Choose **iOS Bundle Signing** under **Build**, and select the corresponding **Identity** and **Provisioning profile** you had just set up for this project.

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the project uses the new profile for code signing.
trans-unit.target: This ensures that the project uses the new profile for code signing.

trans-unit.source: For the official Xamarin device provisioning documentation, see [Xamarin Device Provisioning].
trans-unit.target: For the official Xamarin device provisioning documentation, see [Xamarin Device Provisioning].

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, right-click the project, and then click **Properties**.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, right-click the project, and then click **Properties**.

trans-unit.source: In the properties pages, click the **iOS Application** tab, and update the **Identifier** with the ID that you created earlier.
trans-unit.target: In the properties pages, click the **iOS Application** tab, and update the **Identifier** with the ID that you created earlier.

trans-unit.source: In the **iOS Bundle Signing** tab, select the corresponding **Identity** and **Provisioning profile** you had just set up for this project.
trans-unit.target: In the **iOS Bundle Signing** tab, select the corresponding **Identity** and **Provisioning profile** you had just set up for this project.

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the project uses the new profile for code signing.
trans-unit.target: This ensures that the project uses the new profile for code signing.

trans-unit.source: For the official Xamarin device provisioning documentation, see [Xamarin Device Provisioning].
trans-unit.target: For the official Xamarin device provisioning documentation, see [Xamarin Device Provisioning].
